catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 903
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small, light gray-blue lidded container with inlaid design of stylized chrysanthemums and dark, arabesque stems; organic design around outer border
medium: Stoneware with inlaid design under celadon glaze
text: This luxurious covered box was probably used to store cosmetics, or, alternatively, as a container for incense. The lid is decorated with white chrysanthemums and black stems and leaves.
title: Covered box with chrysanthemums
